name: Torpedoes With Guns
description:
Torpedoes With Guns is a fast-paced, endless arcade-shooter. There are no levels, the goal is to simply cause as much destruction as possible before detonating.

Features

  • Endless level generation
  • Dynamic difficulty adaptations
  • Unlockable player torpedoes
  • "Easy to learn, hard to master" controls
  • Vibrant pixel art and colors
  • Addicting "one more try" gameplay
